main.name: Gagan Deep
main.bio: My name is Gagan, I'm a Full Stack Web Developer. Currently I'm looking for a job as a Front web developer

resume.skillmessage: Here you can create a short write-up of your skills to show off to employers

education.degree: Post-Graduate in Computer Software & Database Development
education.description: I have learnt various web technologies like HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, Bootstrap, React, Angular.

work.title: Team Member && Front-end Developer
work.description: Fixed errors from existing websites and performed upgrades that significantly improved web functionality and speed.Collaborated with the cross-functional teams to convert visual designs, user experience flows, and content into functional and engaging interfaces ensuring high performance on mobile and desktop.Actively participated in the full development life cycle including functional specifications, work estimation, design, development, cross-browser testing, bug resolution, and deployment.

work.title: Full Stack Web Developer
work.description: Build a dynamic and interactive website that ensures high traffic, page views, and User Experience, resulting in a 35% growth in sales revenue.Improved web application security applications, minimizing hacker attacks from 2.5% to 0.03%.Co-ordinated the workflow with the UI/UX designer and co-operated with the back-end developers in the process of building RESTful API.

projects.title: Amazon Clone
projects.category: Amazon Clone built with MERN React as Front end and Firebase as Backend

projects.title: Galaxy Car Wash & Detailing
projects.category: Client website built with HTML5, CSS3, Bootstrap, JavaScript, PHP and MySQL

projects.title: About Me

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Sonny Sangha must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
